entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Oxtongue Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:01 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Algonquin Park East Gate 08:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
Temperature: -8.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 87 %
Dewpoint: -10.4°C
Wind: E 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending early this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
